actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to increase the amounts authorized to be appropriated for fiscal years 1985, 1986, and 1987 for commodity distribution; and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to increase the amounts authorized to be appropriated for FY 1985 through 1987, for the surplus commodities program. Repeals the authority of the Secretary of Agriculture to reduce the cents-per-meal level.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to increase the amounts authorized to be appropriated for fiscal years 1985, 1986, and 1987 for commodity distribution; and for other purposes.
